programme.desc: The definitive guide to the markets in Hong Kong and on the mainland. Rishaad Salamat, David Ingles, Tom Mackenzie and Yvonne Man bring you the latest analysis to get you ready for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: Live from Hong Kong, Bloomberg Markets: Asia brings you the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.desc: Live from London, Bloomberg Markets: European Open is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: The Slit Mouthed Woman
programme.desc: Decades ago, a suburb was terrorized by the spirit of a woman in a surgical mask who asked victims, "Am I pretty?" before slaughtering them. Now, police and teachers must end a new wave of carnage.

programme.title: Warning : Do Not Play
programme.desc: Aspiring director Mi-Jung finds strange things happening to her after she begins researching a movie that's supposedly filmed by a ghost.

programme.title: Arumi
programme.desc: 15 years after the murder of her mother and sister, Rasty invites four friends to her parents villa. Intending only to vacation at the villa, they end up with far more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Penjaga
programme.desc: While out on a picnic by the river, a little girl spots a peculiar stone in the river bed. She picks it up and brings it home. Soon, disaster strikes.
